explains: adj. 机会主义的；投机取巧的

sentences.en: Many of the strongly opportunistic plants are the common weeds of fields and gardens.
sentences.cn: 许多非常机会主义的植物都是田野和花园中常见的杂草。

sentences.en: These kinds of systems are primarily designed to protect against the sort of opportunistic smash and grab attack that makes up the majority of burglaries.
sentences.cn: 这类系统主要被用来防止占大多数盗窃案件中的机会主义粉碎和抢夺攻击。

sentences.en: Many of the party's members joined only for opportunistic reasons.
sentences.cn: 这个政党的许多成员入党纯粹是出于投机。
